thread.title: Skolopad's #Umzimba will answer all your questions about the lady in a yellow dress
thread.title_full: Skolopad's #Umzimba will answer all your questions about the lady in a yellow dress

title: Skolopad's #Umzimba will answer all your questions about the lady in a yellow dress
text:
Miss Pru gets blasted for being 'childish' in her award acceptance speech 
Nonhlanhla Qwabe (Skolopad) better known as the lady in the (revealing) yellow dress at MMA16, just released a song on the onternet titled Umzimba. 
The self-proclaimed house DJ has been trying to break into the industry for a while now and it seems that she may have just found a way in. It turns out the professional nurse did not just wear her dress for attention but actually for the hype in preparation for her latest realese. 
She took toTwitter to announce the release of her track, which basically tells women to flaunt their bodies without shame (see what she did there?). She also borrowed from Riky Rick's speech and said the rapper encouraged artists to release their music on the net and she heeded that advice. 
And her album will be ready in April! I really shut it down at #mma16 . Now it's time to download my song and hear my #Umzimba https://t.co/2rwylnaAIu https://t.co/lilH6qeXm1 I knew there was some other motive behind the dress. Well played it worked https://t.co/ADWH3VyVMA Ye !!! I'm downloading right now!Talk about saving thousands on PR! Smart girl! Now push this single! https://t.co/YNi4WOdbtx
